ReturnValues (GVL)
ReturnValues (GVL)
Â¶
This GVL contains the error codes of the alarm manager API
Attributes:
qualified_only
InOut:
Scope
Name
Type
Initial
Comment
Constant
ERR_OK
UDINT
Errors.ERR_OK
Processing successful
ERR_NOTINITIALIZED
UDINT
Errors.ERR_NOTINITIALIZED
Tried to perform an operation on an instance, that is still
intial
ERR_PARAMETER
UDINT
Errors.ERR_PARAMETER
Invalid parameter passed, e.g. an index outside the valid
index range
ERR_NO_OBJECT
UDINT
Errors.ERR_NO_OBJECT
Requested object (e.g. IAlarmManagerClient instance) was not
found
ERR_DUPLICATE
UDINT
Errors.ERR_DUPLICATE
Object still exists (e.g. IAlarmManagerClient instance is
already registered)
ERR_NO_ALARM_MANAGER_CLIENT
UDINT
16#1000
No valid instance of IAlarmManagerClient passed to method
IAlarmHandler2.RegisterClient
ERR_NO_FILTER_CRITERIA
UDINT
16#1001
The return value of IAlarmManagerClient.GetFilterCriteria is
no valid instance of IAlarmFilterCriteria
ERR_NO_ALARMGROUP_FILTER_CRITERIA
UDINT
16#1002
The filter criteria the IAlarmManagerClient instance specifies has no filter criterion
considering the alarm groups.
ERR_NO_ALARMCLASS_FILTER_CRITERIA
UDINT
16#1003
The filter criteria the IAlarmManagerClient instance specifies has no filter criterion
considering the alarm classes.
ERR_INVALID_PRIORITY_FILTER
UDINT
16#1004
The filter criteria the IAlarmManagerClient instance specifies has an invalid filter criterion
considering the priority of the alarm classes, i.e. âpriority toâ < âpriority formâ
ERR_NO_ALARM_STORAGE
UDINT
16#1005
No access to the alarm storage possible, because no array for storing alarms from storage
has been passed during registering the client
ERR_UNEXPECTED_ALARMSTATE
UDINT
16#1006
The current processing did not expect the current alarm
state.

rows:
Tried to perform an operation on an instance, that is still
intial

Invalid parameter passed, e.g. an index outside the valid
index range

Requested object (e.g. IAlarmManagerClient instance) was not
found

Object still exists (e.g. IAlarmManagerClient instance is
already registered)

No valid instance of IAlarmManagerClient passed to method
IAlarmHandler2.RegisterClient

The return value of IAlarmManagerClient.GetFilterCriteria is
no valid instance of IAlarmFilterCriteria

The filter criteria the IAlarmManagerClient instance specifies has no filter criterion
considering the alarm groups.

The filter criteria the IAlarmManagerClient instance specifies has no filter criterion
considering the alarm classes.

The filter criteria the IAlarmManagerClient instance specifies has an invalid filter criterion
considering the priority of the alarm classes, i.e. âpriority toâ < âpriority formâ

No access to the alarm storage possible, because no array for storing alarms from storage
has been passed during registering the client

The current processing did not expect the current alarm
state.
